content.raw:
The default email settings for new accounts on answers.gazebosim.org result in an email for every new question and answer. This is pretty spammy for users that just create an account to ask one question or browse the forums.

As a side note, my email provider (AOL) is marking all email from the answers.gazebosim.org domain as spam because the SPF rules for gzebosim.org are not set up. This is almost certainly causing other email vendors to mark your emails as spam as well.
